about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of Ahoy, an immersive naval adventure game set in the historic era of the late 18th-century Caribbean. The game promises a rich experience, where player decisions shape the narrative, impacting the fate of the New World. Prepare for a captivating tale of freedom, courage, and the unyielding call of the sea.




As your character navigates the tempestuous waters of the Caribbean, they must adapt or perish. With growing reputation comes power, but every power has its price. Your choices will ignite conflict between colonial empires, indigenous people, and audacious pirates. With your player and AI crew by your side, you will dictate the destiny of the Caribbean.




The vibrant and diverse environment of the Caribbean offers countless opportunities for discovery. Players must master a variety of sailing techniques and strategies as they voyage from the bustling trade routes to secluded pirate coves. Each decision shapes your journey, leaving a unique mark on the world. Craft your legacy, make allies, defeat enemies, and confront challenges in your own style. No two voyages are ever the same.




Each vessel in Ahoy is meticulously reconstructed with an unwavering dedication to historical authenticity. Every cabin, rope, ring, and hinge has been crafted based on actual historical artefacts, blueprints, and models. Beyond being a riveting gameplay experience, Ahoy also serves as an educational journey. The game enriches player understanding of maritime life by providing detailed explanations and demonstrations of the terminology and techniques prevalent in the late 18th-century nautical world.




Ahoy's combat employs authentic naval and hand-to-hand combat mechanics. Command your crew in first person, leverage the wind, and manage your arsenal while pitted against AI and player captains in an environment rich with interactive elements. Whether you plan flawless strategies with your crew or shock your allies with unexpected manoeuvres, navigating relationships is as crucial as navigating the seas.




Engage in thrilling multiplayer skirmishes with up to 16 players(*) crewing each ship, promising exhilarating naval warfare. With an ambitious roadmap set to enhance the scale of confrontations, Ahoy is poised to deliver a maritime experience that is truly unmatched.

(*) 16 players is the current aspirational target for multiplayer. Not all ships will enable player crews of this size and technical exploration found in development may alter our players-per-ship target up or down.




As we continue to refine Ahoy, our goal is to encapsulate the essence of life in the late 18th century in an engaging and immersive manner. We invite you to explore our FAQ on our website, which provides a detailed overview of our current objectives and future aspirations for the development of Ahoy.




Add Ahoy to your wishlist, follow us, and join our Discord community so you don't miss out on any news!

content_descriptors.notes: This game will contain violence and gore subject to the requirements of the naval combat experience, however great portions of the experience are available which avoid this aspect of the game, and the gore amount is controllable for each player within the game settings.

short_description: Ahoy is a multiplayer voyage to the 1780s. Cooperate with fellow captains and officers to explore the West Indies. Trade goods, manage your Player and NPC crew, and engage in ferocious naval battles. Master seamanship to forge a legacy in this historically accurate representation of the Age of Sail.
